title: "Comedians laugh off AI’s effect on stand-up: ‘Like eating processed foods’"
excerpt: "Comics tend to skew skeptical that AI can replicate attributes including timing and presence. A general claim reigns that the best AI currently seems able to offer is lazy and outright basic joke-writing."
